LAE4342 - Programs in Teaching Language.name: LAE4342 - Programs in Teaching Language and Composition

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Special programs, strategies and materials for middle and secondary English Language Arts majors. Emphasis on individual needs of students.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Course objectives for a school curriculum and methods and materials which have special application for teaching English at the middle grades and high school.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: ENC 1101 and admission to the college OR admission to English Language Arts Education minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course is designed to explore adolescent/young adult literature from an educational and historical perspective.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to Undergraduate Elementary Education Program or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Criteria for analysis and evaluation of children's literature in terms of interests, needs, and abilities of children.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

LAE4314 - Language Arts in the Elementar.name: LAE4314 - Language Arts in the Elementary School

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Content, principles, materials, and techniques involved in teaching, speaking, listening, writing, and spelling in the elementary school; organizing for instruction.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

LAE4466 - Canon, Young Adult Literature.name: LAE4466 - Canon, Young Adult Literature and the English Language Arts Curriculum

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course focuses on special application for teaching canonical texts while demonstrating the bridge between canonical text and young adult literature for teaching English Language Arts at middle and high school.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

LAE4361 - Literacy Strategies in a Digit.name: LAE4361 - Literacy Strategies in a Digital Age for Middle and High School

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to graduate program or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Designed to assist teachers in understanding and presenting information using digital literacies, technological innovations, language arts skills and multicultural models of instruction for secondary instruction.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education
